verbs.description: That burns . [ARG0: Sen. Chuck Schumer] [V: trolled] [ARG1: President Trump] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] , [ARGM-ADV: invoking the First Lady Melania Trump ’s “ Be Best ” campaign] .
